response.overview: Juniper embarks on a journey into a dystopian wasteland to trade a Thickberry for a rare medication called Serenity, hoping to cure her family from the cancerous Sprayings. Along the way, her bitingly witty and yammering tumor Lump questions her motives. As Juniper battles her own illness and strange visions, including a talking bus stop and herself in a bathtub, she faces an internal struggle between duty and self-fulfillment. The film follows Juniper as she searches for purpose in a desolate world.
response.title: Is That a Mirage?
